sen.e: Kanpaku Kaneka ICHIJO who was Mototeru's biological father and took over the Ichijo family by being adopted from the Takatsukasa family worried about that and sent a messenger to the Kasuga-Taisha Shrine and asked for an oracle to decide the heir.
